# babbling about

## problem

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/ddaee695-f103-40bf-a6ff-b339ebb8ad3d)

location.txt
```
Hexagon: 

Wall: 5 - 2

Shelf: 16 / 4

Volume: 22 + 1 - 1
```

## solution

this is just one of those challenges where you have to know the tool that is required for the challenge

importantly, it's the [library of babel](https://libraryofbabel.info/)

clicking "Browse", we can put in the hexagon provided in locations.txt

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/6a1b4a8c-ddce-43ff-aa0b-9c4160c65522)

Then, we have to click on wall number `5-2` (it's equal to 3 if you didn't know)

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/9835bfd1-a715-405a-b245-bac6e8c3c5eb)

Shelf is 16/4 = 4

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/b273b10a-6c89-4c9a-b236-63bc328eb31d)

Volume is 22 + 1 - 1 = 22

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/a2f9a7fb-7fae-4629-99a4-2d6fca045976)

The page is hinted as being the number that websites give when the page is not found (http error 404)

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/55c11120-f379-4874-980c-d4fffba82899)

can you see it?

![image](https://github.com/quasar098/ctf-writeups/assets/70716985/351b5798-26ac-473e-8e7d-c93dfefd2b48)

`nbctf{love.this.library}` is the flag
